Introduction

Hyunjun, formerly known as Hwall and Hyunjun Hur, is a South Korean singer-songwriter, dancer, and actor under Blossom Entertainment. He is a former member of the boy group THE BOYZ.

He made his solo debut on August 14, 2020, with the digital single "Baragi".

On October 23, 2019, Hwall left THE BOYZ to focus on his recovery from a leg injury.

He made his debut as an actor with the BL series "Color Rush" on December 30th, 2020.
